mapper.select: /*AS 쓰고싶으면 resultType으로 해줘야한다.*/ SELECT b.board_code, bc.board_category_name, b.board_title, b.id, b.board_datetime, b.board_hits FROM board AS b INNER JOIN board_category AS bc ON b.board_category_code = bc.board_category_code ORDER BY board_code;

SELECT b.board_code, b.id, b.board_title, b.board_contents, b.board_datetime, b.board_image, bc.board_category_name FROM board AS b INNER JOIN board_category AS bc ON b.board_category_code = bc.board_category_code WHERE b.board_code = #{boardCode};
mapper.insert:
SELECT (CASE WHEN COUNT(board_code) = 0 THEN 'bc001' WHEN MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(board_code, 'bc', -1) AS UNSIGNED)) > 999 THEN CONCAT('bc', MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(board_code,'bc',-1) AS UNSIGNED))+1) ELSE CONCAT('bc', LPAD(MAX(CAST(SUBSTRING_INDEX(board_code,'bc',-1) AS UNSIGNED))+1,3,0)) END )AS boardCode FROM board
INSERT INTO board (board_code, id, board_category_code, board_title, board_contents, board_datetime, board_image, board_hits) VALUES (#{boardCode}, #{id}, #{boardCategoryCode}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContents}, NOW(), #{boardImage}, #{boardHits})
mapper.select: SELECT board_category_code, id, board_category_name, registration_datetime FROM board_category;
SELECT board_category_code ,id ,board_category_name ,registration_datetime FROM board_category WHERE board_category_code = #{boardCategoryCode};
